Comments_List: I learned a lot about different problems in financial economics and the challenges of deriving a strong predictive model, which is close to reality.

Strenght:
- The instructor was always very motivated and knowledgeable, well prepared and friendly. 
- Choice of topics was reasonable and gave a good overview about what has been done in this area

Weakness:
- Overtime
Yes! John is a great instructor and you can learn a lot of things from him. It was a pleasure taking his class.
Yes, it teaches the fundamental logic of financial market mechanisms.

This course taught me more than any other economics course I've taken at Yale. That being said, if it still runs from 4-7pm when you take this class, you should bring a burrito or you won't be able to concentrate.
